description: The Department of National Defence Canadian Forces School of Search and Rescue (CFSSAR) is seeking qualified subject matter specialists to teach beginner and advanced mountain rescue techniques in support of Canada's Search and Rescue mandate for Canadians - searching in BC region.
full_summary:
# W0133-24T057 - Mountain Rescue Training for the Canadian Forces School of Search and Rescue

## Tender Information

 Tenders are invited from qualified subject matter specialists to teach beginner and advanced mountain rescue techniques in support of Canada’s Search and Rescue mandate for Canadians. 

* **Publication Date:** 2023-11-30
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-12-15T14:00:00 (Closed)

## Notice Details

**Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

## Supplier Information

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
	+ City: Gatineau
	+ Province: Quebec
	+ Postal Code: K1A 0S5
	+ Country: Canada

## Notice Description

The Canadian Forces School of Search and Rescue (CFSSAR) is seeking subject matter specialists to teach beginner and advanced mountain rescue techniques in support of Canada’s Search and Rescue mandate.

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

* **Brittney Jackson**, Procurement Specialist
* Phone: N/A
* Email: [<brittney.jackson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:brittney.jackson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Note: The original tender is now closed as indicated in the tender closing date.

Here is the [Notice Link](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18148100?extsite=MTgxNDgxMDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for the full tender document.
I have reformatted everything into a clean and easy-to-read Markdown format, focusing only on the relevant information for the tender.
